item.description:
We're getting happy at BILLY TEE'S!!! Why not join us???

 

Billy Tee's is known for their delicious pizzas. Just take a look at the outstanding menu...

  http://www.billyteescromwell.com/MenuToGo.html#Pizzas

 

Just about any combination you can dream of. How about a great beer to go along with that pizza. Wait...it gets even better !!!

At 9pm the band starts and there is music for your dancing pleasure. Major Motion will be playing in THE HIDEAWAY!

Sound good...well join us for a fun night. A tasty pizza...a good beer...fun music...and GREAT COMPANY! It just doesn't get any better than this!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri or Colleen...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: BE HAPPY...DON'T WORRY...AT BILLY TEE'S...
